phrases: Do it, or I will kill her!
There is nowhere left to run!
That is how long you have until this country of yours falls.
You have not given me an answer regarding our pact yet.
Make a pact with me, and I will save you.
I was not strong enough, that is why...
Could not you have protected her?
You were there, were not you?!
Why could not you keep her safe?!
Aina-chan would not like to see you this way, Senpai.
What is going to happen to the rest of us?
You people piss me off, every last one of you.
Look, you should ask someone else to do that.
I cannot make the students do this.
It was just as you indicated, Captain.
I located five completed Valvraves in the lowest level of the Module.
I also found several dismantled units that were either incomplete or had been abandoned.
I have given him just about as much leeway as I can.
I can only hold back the pre-Reformation old guard for so long.
this will be your final chance.
If I can strike a blow at the students who are holding him prisoner, L-elf will return.
I will leave this next operation to you.
Someone familiar with Module 77 is the best choice.
I know you can do it.
You are as lovely as ever, Kriemhild my dear!
I am a man, she is a woman.
No, I am an adult, and you are a horny child.
In that case, please make a man out of me!
Why has not Captain Cain reported L-elf's actions?
I expect it is because there is not enough accurate information to make a proper report.
I should have realized it sooner.
I am sorry, I told myself I would not cry...
It is been hectic for me, too.
Akira's talking to someone besides me?
That is the name Aina-chan gave us.
She said we were not monsters, we have been touched by God.
That is a really sweet name...
Please, let me pilot a Valvrave!
After I have made certain they are safe.
I cannot leave things like this!
Just hand it over, damn it!
You expect me to be calm at a time like this?!
Taking out equipment without permission is prohibited!
The ARUS fleet got taken out!
So we have no choice but to fight, right?
Do you want even more of our buddies to die?!
Besides, JIOR law prohibits its citizens from carrying guns.
Are you some kind of moron?
If we fight, even more will die.
Return to the school building and take up the stations we decided on earlier.
I repeat, return to the school and take up the positions we decided on earlier!
We are all counting on you, Haruto!
But before he can use those silver things, I...
I left this hatch unlocked the last time.
I am going to take away all of your options.
They must have towed them here from the harbor.
They really are nothing but students.
They cannot even manage their own weapons.
Lay down your weapons and surrender.
The shells' point of impact is moving closer to you by 100 meters each minute.
They are both inside and outside...
Give an answer before our attack reaches your school.
You never did like to get your hands dirty in a mop-up operation, A-drei.
Do not get any funny ideas just because your buddies are here, you bastard!
All I am doing is slowing him down!
According to my analysis, those weapons will shut down after a set period of time has elapsed.
There is no need to destroy them.
We simply need to prevent them from resting.
The volleys are getting closer and closer.
Haruto, you have got to do something!
Rest easy, I am going to avenge you.
If I do not do something, I am going to overheat!
Beg your Dorssian friends to spare your life!
We will use you as a bargaining chip to negotiate with them.
I am the Student Council President Renbokoji Satomi!
I am going to resolve the crisis the school is facing!
Patch this call through to him.
Give me the chance, and I will defeat the Dorssians at the cost of only eight lives.
Are you seriously letting this guy come up with our plan?
We cannot trust any plan that this guy comes up with!
I know you have a reason for not being able to let things end here.
You are making a deal with the Devil!
After all, I am already cursed.
I will save everyone in the school!
And the girl in the picture, too!
I see that even being caught up in a war will not cure that sweet sentimentality of yours.
Add some sugar, and coffee tastes delicious.
Add it to you, who is too bitter, and it tastes just right.
To make both our dreams come true!
I take back what I said.
We will go for zero losses, as you said.
Move to point L-3074 and bring the green Valvrave with you.
They are more stubborn than expected...
Position the green Valvrave 30 degrees behind you and to your left.
He is firing on the Module?
The silver things are peeling off!
They froze the Sabas with sea water?!
The seawater is venting into space!
It is no use, we cannot hold position!
They dealt with our forces inside and outside at the same time!
Which means we can do whatever we want, right?
I am going to buy him time to charge up.
I never got the chance to tell you.
Your target is the fleet behind you.
I am going to destroy you, that sword and all!
You have a nasty habit of moving in straight lines, X-eins.
Just as I thought, this is the Light of Rune!
Everyone, I am giving this boy half my life.
So would you be so kind as to give him one?
You cannot give half your life to someone!
My mother told me that a woman's hair is her life.
Do you have any idea how long I have been looking for you?
Trying to break our pact on the first day?
No, it is all according to plan.
I knew that you would come looking for me.
I have factored your saccharine nature into my calculations.
With this, our clan can sustain itself...
I can hear the bells ringing out to bless our union...
The system that will expose the truth of the world.
